segments.text: I want to find an old music box .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a great selection . What decade are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have anything made in the 1920s ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do any of them have dancing figures ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , two of them have dancing figures .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fantastic . I think I like this one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A good choice . I prefer that one myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now , is there any warranty with this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no , I'm afraid not . These things are just too old to guarantee anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Even if they break down , they're still works of art .
segments.speaker: S2
